## Install the `NEesp2` package

Install the versioned package:
```{r}
remotes::install_github("NEFSC/READ-EDAB-NEesp2", ref = "v0.1.0")
```

or 

```{r}
pak::pak("NEFSC/READ-EDAB-NEesp2")
```
